title: Roasted Turkey Sandwich
subtitle: Carved roasted turkey breast
text: In this sandwich, bacon & turkey breast are BFFs. Carved roasted turkey breast is served with our hickory-smoked bacon, Swiss cheese, lettuce, tomato & mayonnaise, all on magnificently marbled rye. Add avocado for an additional charge.

title: Philly Cheese Steak Stacker
subtitle: Grilled Philly sirloin steak
text: This signature favorite is stacked with grilled Philly sirloin steak and thinly sliced onion, then topped with melted American cheese on a perfectly grilled roll. Add avocado for an additional charge.

title: Turkey, Bacon & Avocado Wrap
subtitle: Roasted turkey breast
text: Three of the most popular tastes come together for the better. We took carved roasted turkey breast, ripe avocado and hickory-smoked bacon, then added tomatoes, mixed greens, red onions and ranch and rolled them snug as a hug in a flour tortilla wrap.
